data.actual_result: Time can go missing randomly, but will reappear when a person posts something new.
data.expected_result: Time should always appear in the time stamp.
data.short_description: Time goes missing in the time stamp randomly with long name or nickname. [iPhone X and iPhone Plus models only]
data.steps_to_repro: - Be in a conversation. - Make sure you and your friend has a long nickname. - Chat normally for about 10 - 15 minutes. - Observe and pay attention.
